thread.section_title: The Surrey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect stay
thread.title_full: Perfect stay - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: W8891YCmarcm
title: Perfect stay
text: One of the best place in NYC. Rooms are delicate and so relaxing after long days spent in muséums, shops and restaurants. Café Boulud is for sure one the best you need to try, and try again. The Surrey has the perfect location : next to central park, the best shops and restaurants. If you come down you will come back again
